userId.description: Discord Id of the user that is configured to use this command.

tag.description: Discord handle of the user that is configured to use this command.

reportedForPOAP.description: Number of times this user reported for POAP spam.

isPremium.description: True if discord member is a premium DEGEN pro subscriber, false otherwise

isPOAPDeliveryEnabled.description: true if user opted to have POAPs directly delivered.
